group_1.textCenter: 'Kay! I stopped it movin', so I'm countin'@that as a win!

group_1.textLeft: What...just happened?

group_1.textRight: Felicia's magic can cause memory lapses...@She must have sent Eve's memories flying.
Thanks, Felicia! Nice shot!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][se:4050_landing_jump]Don't get cocky just because you had one@good shot!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge][se:4051_landing_throw]Master! Felicia!

group_1.textLeft: [flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge][se:4001_equip_arms_bow_vh]Don't miss!!!
[flashEffect:flashWhite2][bgEffect:shakeLarge]Nyaughhh!

group_1.textRight: You expanded your shield...? I see. So@you can use it like that, too...

group_1.textLeft: Yachiyo! Sorry, your arm!

group_1.textRight: It's not too bad. It's just a little numb.
If Iroha and Tsuruno hadn't diverted that@attack...
It would've been a lot worse.
*Pant* *Pant*
Master!
Yachiyo!
There. Now you should be able to move it@again...

group_1.textLeft: Thank you.

group_1.textRight: We protected Banbanzai and Kako's bookstore,@right?!

group_1.textLeft: That's right. Thanks for that, Felicia.

group_1.textRight: Oh, and one more thing...

group_1.textLeft: What is it?

group_1.textRight: When I hit that huge bug thing, it started @glowing.

group_1.textLeft: Glowing?

group_1.textRight: Yeah, around...its chest? Or its belly, I@guess?

group_1.textLeft: What could it be?

group_1.textRight: Ughhh... P-probably magic, I think...

group_1.textLeft: You shouldn't move so much, Momoko...

group_1.textRight: I can't just sit around at a time like this.
When that thing blasted me...
I could tell for sure that Eve was storin'@its magic in the center of its body.
Then all of a sudden it moved the magic to@its arms and sent me flyin' from the side.

group_1.textLeft: Hmm...
So when its body glows, its magic moves...@That might be a clue to beating it...

group_1.textRight: Please listen closely!

group_1.textLeft: Huh?!
Hey, we're really beaten up over here...
Don't scare the living daylights out of us@with your telepathy, got it?! Dumbass!
I felt like I was gonna have a heart@attack...

group_1.textRight: Ah, then I very much apologize for my—@Wait, no! Now is not the time!
Please listen closely!

group_1.textLeft: What's wrong, Tsukuyo?

group_1.textRight: This concerns Eve!

group_1.textLeft: We were just talking about that here, too.
The flute sisters spent time at Eve's chapel.@We can probably trust what she says...

group_1.textRight: Yes! Without a shadow of a doubt!

group_1.textLeft: Then will you tell us what you know?

group_1.textRight: Certainly...

group_1.narration: The story starts when we were trying@to hatch Eve only with the energy we@collected from Uwasas and Witches.
We worked with the Magius to study@Eve in the hope that we could learn some@way to make it hatch more quickly.
What we learned was not a way to speed up@its hatching date... Rather, we found that as@it amassed more and more impurities, so to@did it amass more and more gems as well.
Those countless gems are the chains that@prevent its tremendous body from collapsing.
At the same time, they serve a similar role@to blood vessels in that they regulate@huge amounts of energy, and negate the@relationship between Soul Gem and Witch body.
The core of that system is the@largest red jewel on Eve's chest.
That gem is the lock binding all its chains,@the core transmitting all its energy.

group_1.textRight: That lines up with what Felicia and Momoko@said...
Once it gathers energy in its core, it @transmits it to where it's most needed...
If Eve needs to do that before it can do@anything else...
It'd make sense for the red gemstone in@Eve's chest to be the core...

group_1.textLeft: You're right.
It's trying to rectify the strange, warped@state it's in.
Could that gemstone then be its weakpoint?
It is highly likely.

group_1.textRight: For sure.
We wanted to make sure you had that@information.

group_1.textLeft: Thank you. That was good to know. I think@you just turned this crisis on its head.

group_1.textRight: Glad to hear it.
Anyway, we'll be meeting back up with all of@you before you know it.
Keep fighting the good fight until then...
Our deepest apologies... We are the ones@who raised Eve, after all.

group_1.textLeft: The Magius were using you.
I can't blame you for that...
For now, let's just do everything we can to@help each other.

group_1.textRight: I'd like that. We will see you later!

group_1.textLeft: Yes! Later!
It's going for the shopping center again?!

group_1.textRight: No, it looks like thanks to Felicia it's@changed direction.
But now it's headed for...

group_1.textLeft: That's Chuo Ward...

group_1.textRight: The skyscrapers there... Eve's gem, the weak@point in its chest...
We may have to use the buildings over there@to string Eve up.

group_1.textLeft: True, the way things are now we can't get @anywhere near the gem on its chest.
But I'm not sure we can string it up.
She has a point. We couldn't even pin it@down just now.
I'm not sure I'd call that a good strategy.

group_1.textRight: Pinning it down and stringing it up are two@completely different things.
We'll aim for its wing joints.
No matter how it thrashes around, it can't@reach there with its legs.
And even if it does find a way to wriggle@free, it'll take much more time than before.
We should take care of it quickly, before@it starts raging and destroys the building.
